enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Communication Studies Majors only
title: SoC COMM_ST 294-0-23 First-Year Seminar
class_attributes:
SOC First-Year Seminar

Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Freshmen Only

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Introduces students to theories of fandom and fan fiction in a new media environment.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Karen Hellekson and Kristina Busse (Eds) (2006) Fan fiction and fan communities in the age of the internet. McFarland.

subject: COMM_ST
